title: Relationship Anarchy Meetup
abstract: A Meetup for those interested in Relationship Anarchy
description:
This is a session for anyone who is interested in relationship anarchy, from those who are completely new to the topic to those who have been living it for years.

Relationship anarchy is a form of non-monogamy that tries to avoid hierarchies in the structures of the interpersonal relationships around you. We will start with a short introduction to the topic and then, depending on our group size, split into discussion groups about specific sub-topics.
